meanings.definition: In or into a position behind or at the back of something
meanings.sent1: She placed the book adours the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The cat hid adours the couch.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel ran adours the tree, trying to escape the rain.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts lingered adours the memories of his childhood.
meanings.sent5: The treasure was hidden adours the old castle, waiting to be discovered.

meanings.definition: In or into a position near or at the side of something
meanings.sent1: The flowers bloomed adours the fence.
meanings.sent2: He parked his bike adours the building.
meanings.sent3: The children gathered adours the teacher, eager to hear the story.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness shone adours her actions, touching everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The stars twinkled adours the moon, creating a magical night sky.

meanings.definition: In or into a position away from the front or from view
meanings.sent1: She stepped adours to let others pass.
meanings.sent2: The magician disappeared adours before reappearing on stage.
meanings.sent3: The cat sneaked adours when no one was looking.
meanings.sent4: His smile faded adours as he turned to leave.
meanings.sent5: The sun set adours, painting the sky in hues of orange and pink.
